text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-DocumentStorage
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    ARarchived (not active)A storage status in which a document has been stored off-line for long-term access.
    PUpurgedA storage status in which a document is no longer available in this system.
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-DocumentStorageActive

name: DocumentStorage
title: DocumentStorage
description: Identifies the storage status of a document.
